column4: hi all :) apt-get is telling me that "it is not going to be installed" (packages include lsb-{core,graphics,cxx,desktop.printing}) does that mean i should not install them?
that just means their not going to be includeed in the update or w/e you can install them if you wish, but they are either not requried or not supported or they are restricted repositories
thanks. i am going to update before installing..
